channel.title: Free beer
channel.description:
Now that i have your attention,
(1)how do I edit the teleports in the mage book to go to different coordinates. (2)what is the commands that tells me the coordinates of the place im currently standing (3)where do i find the commands
Thanks you very much!

item.title: Free beer
item.dc:creator: @kirmizi_kalp kirmizi_kalp
item.description:
@kirmizi_kalp wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:2, topic:329364”]Meh, well anyways to find where to get to your commands

go to Client.java and search for public void customCommands

Right after a command that already exists, add yours.

mypos:

if (command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY + " Your Height=" + heightLevel); sendMessage("MapRegionX=" + mapRegionX + " MapRegionY=" + mapRegionY); sendMessage("CurrentX=" + currentX + " CurrentY=" + currentY); } }

If you get errors change the “sendMessage” to sM. make sure you get them all.

And about teleports, if you have a clickingMost.java search for “Varrock”

If you don’t it’s in your client.java[/quote]

1# ::mypost, ::mypos your Home teleport, wich teleport you ever wanna Change
1b# EXAMPLE: AbsX 3087 AbsY : 3494
2# Now go to ClickingMost.java Ctrl F search FOR

c.triggerTele(3087, 3494, 0);
3# Change the '' 3087 4944 '' in the Place you want to

Hope this helped GL.

Read full topic

item.title: Free beer
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

for the teleports, you might not always HAVE the teleport (some servers have them removed entirely!), so you might have to add it in clickingmost.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Free beer
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Meh, well anyways to find where to get to your commands

go to Client.java and search for public void customCommands

Right after a command that already exists, add yours.

mypos:

if (command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY + " Your Height=" + heightLevel); sendMessage("MapRegionX=" + mapRegionX + " MapRegionY=" + mapRegionY); sendMessage("CurrentX=" + currentX + " CurrentY=" + currentY); } }

If you get errors change the “sendMessage” to sM. make sure you get them all.

And about teleports, if you have a clickingMost.java search for “Varrock”

If you don’t it’s in your client.java

Read full topic
